fields.imdisbursedregular:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for your message.

Since your account has no dues, we can assist you in updating the bank account mobile number or other bank details.

Please email us a 90-day bank statement (PDF format) for your updated bank account. The statement must clearly show:

Your name
Account number
IFSC code

If you're salaried, please also share your salary credit date (we require at least 2 salary credits). If you're self-employed, just the bank statement will suffice.

Once received, weâ€™ll update your details accordingly.

Best Regards,
Team InstaMoney
